message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $14,000. I believe this product would be highly beneficial to you, and this is a fair price.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you considering my budget.  I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. Let me know if that works for you.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $13,700.  This product offers significant value, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit.  I'm still really interested in the product but $13,500 is the highest I can go right now.  Let me know if that works for you.
